message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about different types of metals. Ferrous metals are metals that contain iron. Glass (option A), grass (option B), and wood (option D) do not contain iron and therefore do not classify as ferrous metals. Vehicle scraps (option C), on the other hand, often contain iron and are a common source of ferrous metals.

This question requires some basic knowledge about types of metals. Ferrous metals are metals that contain iron. Option (C) is the correct answer because vehicle scraps often contain iron and other ferrous metals. Option (A) is incorrect because glass does not contain iron. Option (B) is incorrect because grass is a plant material and does not contain iron. Option (D) is incorrect because wood is a plant material and does not contain iron.
